MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:40pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:56am on 28 November 2020
